title: Rochester Airport Marriott Invites Canadians To Stretch Their Travel Dollars Further With Special Discounted Rate
text:
Rochester Airport Marriott
Rochester hotel offers 20 percent off newly renovated guest rooms and suites, convenient location to popular attractions
ROCHESTER, N.Y. - Canadian residents seeking fun and adventure in the Empire State can take control of their pocketbooks and cross the border with ease to redeem a special offer from Rochester Airport Marriott .
Visitors from the North will receive 20 percent off the downtown Rochester hotel's regular rates when they book a special package and show proof of Canadian residency at check-in. Valid through Jan. 12, 2016 , the deal means travelers will have access to newly renovated guest rooms starting at just $111 USD per night.
With renovations completed earlier this year, the hotel has beautifully transformed its 210 guest rooms, on-site restaurant, Concierge Lounge and fitness center into chic spaces that cater to the modern traveler. Visitors can stay connected and entertained with complimentary high-speed Internet access and flat-panel TVs in all rooms while relaxing in beds with down comforters, custom duvets and cotton-rich linens. On-the-go guests will appreciate mini refrigerators with complimentary bottled water, coffee makers and satisfying room service selections to enjoy in their private, cozy sitting areas.
Boasting an easily accessible location just outside of downtown Rochester , the hotel welcomes leisure travelers from across the border to explore everything the city and its surrounding areas have to offer during an exciting visit to upstate New York . Take the family to a first-class museum, experience the culture of the diverse city with a night downtown or retreat to the pristine shores of Lake Ontario . Finger Lakes Wine Country, Genesee Brew House , Historic Erie Canal/ Village of Pittsford and the Waterloo Premium Outlets are other reasons to visit Rochester .
After a day of work or play, visitors can relax at the hotel's indoor heated pool and sauna or hit the fitness center, complete with cardiovascular equipment and free weights.
Whether traveling with the family or visiting for business, all guests will enjoy a wide selection of convenient dining opportunities at the hotel as well as close proximity to popular area restaurants. Travelers are invited to start their day right with healthy breakfast options at The Caf√©, open for breakfast, and then return to Images Restaurant & Bar, the hotel's on-site restaurant, for a wide selection of mouthwatering dishes and refreshing cocktails during lunch or dinner. Guests can order menu items ranging from appetizing starters and homemade pizzas to crisp salads and handcrafted entrees designed by Executive Chef Matt Regatuso .
To take advantage of the special Canadian rate, visitors should use promotional code RZL when booking online or calling 1-800-228-9290 in the United States or 1-888-236-2427 in Canada.
About Rochester Airport Marriott
Rochester Airport Marriott at 1890 Ridge Road West in Rochester, New York is just minutes from downtown Rochester , The Strong National Museum of Play, Rochester Museum & Science Center, Seneca Park Zoo and other popular attractions along the coast of Lake Ontario . The hotel features 7 floors, 208 guest rooms, 2 suites, 6 meeting rooms with 5,592 square feet of event space, a full-service restaurant, indoor heated pool and sauna and state-of-the-art fitness center. Complimentary wireless Internet access and shuttle service to and from Greater Rochester International Airport are available upon request. For information, visit www.marriott.com/ROCAP , call 1-585-225-6880 and like the hotel on Facebook .
